comments.commentBody: An automatic IRA plan, state or federal based, should be to the advantage of any government.  If a worker saves and invests in a low cost plain vanilla S&P fund, they will better be able to care for themselves which should lighten the need for the entitlement programs Republicans hate to fund.  Yes, Wall Street will get something out of it but costs can be a few tenths of a percentage point. Most IRAs can be rolled over from one plan to the next, so if a worker moves from one state to the next it should be able to move with him if he wants, or as is the case now he can chose to leave it with his old employer/state plan.  Multiple plans are no more a problem than multiple bank accounts.  I have two Traditional IRAs (one a rolled over 401K) and two Roth IRAs.  Discount brokers charge me nothing to hold the accounts and when I want to roll one to a different broker, I fill out the paperwork with the new broker and they do all the work of moving the stocks, bonds and/or cash.
Again Trump shows his weakness. The strong don't whine.

Thank you Patron for your reply. Yes...Medicare is by no means perfect and everybody tries to rip it off but it is light yrs better than any Republicans plan of the past. The rest of the civilized (and not so civilized world) has figured it out and enjoys quality, affordable health insurance as a fraction of the price we pay in America...sometimes as low as 30% of what we pay..Could you imagine that....70% less and nursing home, dental and optic coverage! We are living in the middle ages.

Can our government get serious on healthcare. There are 32 countries on this planet already providing their citizenry universal healthcare. Can our congress at least look at these. Find what will work for us and discard what will not. Would it be possible to find a good, workable plan without any input from insurance companies or drug manufacturers? There are good plans out there!

Here is a plan that would work: unfortunately many people in America are overweight; some severely so. Talk about an 'individual mandate' - why not get people to lose weight? That will drive down the incidence of disease and the need for so much healthcare in this country. But we'll have to to this via a positive method, an incentive. Why not allow people who are physically fit to pay a lower premium than those who are severely overweight? There are so many regulations with Obamacare now, it wouldn't be any worse setting up tiers of fitness. You make it to one tier for your age, height and weight, you get a lower premium. Make it to the next tier, you get another premium reduction. This is a positive way to get people to take responsibility for themselves. Case in point: I know a woman who lost 100 lbs. She now does not have to take medications anymore due to the conditions she had when she was obese. Hurray! Why cannot more folks do this? Sure they can! Give them the incentive (lower health insurance premiums) and some people will do it. I bet it'd catch on! C'mon people! Instead of a handout subsidy, why not an incentive!

We are ignoring the elephant in the room -- the outrageous and continually rising cost of health care, and the pirate robber baron model of extortion that drug companies and hospitals use to set prices (if you can actually get anyone to tell you what a medical procedure might cost).

NOTHING is going to work unless we follow the obvious solution of a single payer health insurance program that is used in civilized countries. Even an ethical health care insurer (a mythical beast of course) could not keep up with the free for all pricing of health care.
Tax credits:  GOP/ trumpspeak for yet another scam, to screw the NOT rich.  Move along.

So here's a slick idea: If we can get enough people to opt out of this whole ball of wax, then maybe these idiots will re-think their grand healthcare scheme. It's basically another tax. I pay enough taxes. People: don't be scared to just opt out entirely and buy catastrophic health insurance. Those plans are still available. And yes, supposedly you are not 'compliant' and may be subject to a penalty. Let's rise up and just refuse all of these screwy plans to herd us all into paying another big tax. Just don't do it. Buy catastrophic insurance and save hundreds or thousands per month. If you put even a quarter of that savings into a bank account, you'll have some money for paying doctor bills that the catastrophic plan won't cover. Anything else, get on a payment plan with the hospital. But don't let the government take you hostage with this. Obamacare was bad enough. Skyrocketing premiums and insurers pulling out left and right - that's where we are now. The GOP's new plan sounds even worse. Just say no!!
Now we know where the televangelists from the 1980s went to: they went into the education business.

Thank you for your reply Jim....You actually bring up a separate point from private vs public......the parent.

I agree with you 100%. All other things being equal, ie access to school, teacher etc. the parent is the critical factor.

The public schools in NYC from app. 1930-1960 ish were incredibly successful, graduating some of the most prepared students in the world. Parents took an interest in their children's education.

After 1960 the NYC school system went downhill, largely due to parent neglect imo. This is not to diss many public school parents who take interest in their children's education today, they are just not enough of them.
AZ politicians creating more ignorant people to vote for them.
a crook, and look around, there are many scams out there.. good reporting here,
Please do another article explaining how this is not criminal?
How does a crook like Yarbrough get elected not only to the senate, but as it's president?
Hmmm . . . a ten per cent skim.  In any other country, that'd be called bribe money.
Paranoia provides primitive concrete organization when a brain is overwhelmed and/or impaired.

Ninja Obama strikes again!. (At least someone is watching out for us.) Thanks Obama!

PS We forgive you for drying up our irrigation canal, shutting down our boat ramp in 2013, and for stealing all the manhole covers on Main Street. And for the wolves, too. Thanks Obama!
Ye, let's please do!

I watched the movie Arrival the other night and loved it, but I thought they could have done a better job at presenting what an Alien creature might look like. It seemed odd to me that an alien would look like an octopus.

Can you imagine what an alien civilization would think if they landed on Earth and were greeted by Trump with his orange hair blowing in the wind. I think they would have a similar reaction.

Democrats, offering no evidence, accused Trump of coordinating with Russia.  So what if Trump has no evidence?  He can say he was wiretapped and the Democrats can say Trump worked with Russia.  They can go back and forth forever; after all, the Democrats never quit, even when there was NO evidence.
The intelligence community thought otherwise with respect to Russia. Trump can deny all he wants, but it's starting to become clear that there is quite a bit of fire behind the smoke.

No evidence that meetings occurred????, Democrats have accused the Trump campaign of MEETING with Russian government agents, and have requested an investigation to SEE if coordination occurred.  There is now substantial evidence that indeed meetings did indeed occur, with even AG Sessions admitting he did meet.
We'll see who has evidence and who doesn't very soon.

Oh boy, atb, did you ever hit the nail on the head! I could not agree with you more!

Yes, NOW!
So, yesterday it would have been paranoia and today it's not.  Sorry, your logic is nonexistent.  Much like Trumpys allegations.

Donnie Donnie Donnie.  Obama didn't tap the phones at Trump Tower.  Not when he had access to the CIA's ultra secret mind reading machine that can access your brainwaves directly at any time. So get rid of the red baseball caps, buddy.  Every crazy person knows the only way to stop the CIA is by wearing an aluminum/tin-foil hat.  Hasn't your trusted aide Steve Bannon told you this?
All these people who don't like or understand science could put their tin foil hats in the microwave!

He might consider putting foil around his windows, too.  A fireman friend in SF said they had one woman who frequently had "kitchen stove" fires; she also had aluminum foil around her windows to keep out something he couldn't remember.  Trump is showing signs of early onset dementia, i.e. paranoid fantasies.  This is both sad, and embarrassing for the United States.  No doubt, his pronouncements are quoted all over the world, because we are the "leader of the free world".  At least we were.
Is paranoid the technical word for totally " fouled " up?????
People who believe the whole universe is about them become paranoid when it is indifferent to them.
Just couldn't hold that "id" in place. Knew it. What - 4 days?  Well Baby Steps. That's what I say.
